title: Broccoli Carrot Chicken
description: A simple stir-fry dish combining broccoli, carrot, and chicken in a savory sauce.
overview: A quick and flavorful broccoli carrot chicken stir-fry.

ingredients.title: Sauce
content: Corn starch slurry – 1 teaspoon of corn starch + 2-3 teaspoons of water

stages.title: Preparation
content: Rinse broccoli and soak for 2 minutes, then chop into bite-size pieces.
Thinly cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces; add a pinch of salt and a pinch of black pepper, then mix well.

stages.title: Cooking
content: In a little oil, stir-fry the chicken for 2-3 minutes. Then add the 3 minced cloves of garlic and sauté for 20-30 seconds.
Add the broccoli and carrot, and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Then add 1 tablespoon of light soy sauce, 2 tablespoons of oyster sauce, 1/2 cup of water, and 1/2 teaspoon of dark soy sauce.
Once simmering, add the corn starch slurry (1 teaspoon of corn starch mixed with 2-3 teaspoons of water).
